# Lab Template

Use this template for any lab page.

## Objective

Define one measurable lab objective.

- Action: `[[what learner does]]`
- Output: `[[what learner submits]]`

## Setup

- Prerequisites: `[[tools/files/context]]`
- Inputs: `[[data/prompts/materials]]`

## Steps

1. `[[step 1]]`
2. `[[step 2]]`
3. `[[step 3]]`

## Deliverables

- `[[deliverable 1]]`
- `[[deliverable 2]]`

## Rubric Summary

Reference `rubrics/labs` and list weighted criteria that matter most for this lab.

## Pass Criteria

- Minimum rubric score met
- Required evidence included
- Results are reviewable and reproducible

## Hours

Estimated effort: `[[min-max hours]]`.

## Ship Checklist

- [ ] Steps completed in order
- [ ] Deliverables attached
- [ ] Self-score added
- [ ] Pass criteria confirmed
